text: Ghislaine Monique Romain Nuytten (17 September 1954 â€“ 18 January 2022) was a Belgian model, television presenter and journalist. Nuytten started her modeling career in 1977. She was the first Flemish international top model. She worked for known designers including Giorgio Armani, Jean Paul Gaultier and Gianni Versace. Between 1985 and 1997, she presented the fashion programs Blikvanger and Look for the BRT. At Radio Donna she had a lifestyle section in the program Vrouwentongen. In later years she was a member of the jury for several seasons of Top Model and Benelux's next top model on VTM, television series in search of new talent. Nuytten died on 18 January 2022 from a heart attack, at the age of 67. ==References== Category:Modeling (profession) Category:Belgian television presenters Category:Belgian journalists Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Ghislaine Nuytten
